kpi.name: sgsn_2153a

kpi_info.title: Gb inter SGSN RA update using S-GW attempts, e2e
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the amount of incoming inter SGSN routing area update involving S-GW attempts on Gb interface. All failures caused by ME, MS or network are included

kpi.kpi_alias: Gb inter SGSN RAU SGW att
